name: Class Point2D.Double
text:
The Double class defines a point specified in
 double precision.
codes:
public static class Point2D.Double
extends Point2D
implements Serializable

fields.description: The X coordinate of this Point2D.
The Y coordinate of this Point2D.

methods.description:
Returns the X coordinate of this Point2D in
 double precision.

Returns the Y coordinate of this Point2D in
 double precision.

methods.method_sig:
public void setLocation (double x,
                        double y)
methods.description:
Sets the location of this Point2D to the
 specified double coordinates.

Returns a String that represents the value
 of this Point2D.
